yes: How are you feeling, School hall monitor?
How can I help you today, School hall monitor?
How's your day going, School hall monitor?
How can I support you, School hall monitor?
no: Let me know if you need anything.
What can I do for you?

responses.text: I could use your medical assistance.

dynamic_line: I was a practicing medicine so I've taken over the medical responsibilities of this school till we can locate an actual doctor.
I'm willing to pay a premium for medical supplies that you might be able to scavenge up.  I also have a few miscellaneous jobs from time to time.

responses.text: What kind of jobs do you have for me?

dynamic_line.yes: I can take a look at you or your companions if you are injured.  Supplies are in shortage, so unfortunately I'll have to ask you for 6 first aid kits, or two if it's just you.
dynamic_line.no: Come back later, I need to take care of a few things first.

responses.text: [2 first aid kit, 30m] I need you to patch me up.  Here's some first aid kits.
[6 first aid kit, 1h] I need you to patch up me and my companions.  Here's some first aid kits.
On second thought, I should be fine.

dynamic_line: Hold still then.  It's the best I can do on short notice.

dialogue.offer: I've got a handful of bandages and a few first aid kits to work with at the moment… in other words I'm completely unable to treat most serious medical emergencies.  I'm supposed to have priority on any medical supplies that the scavengers bring in but I imagine the black market for the stuff will prevent me from ever seeing it.  I could use your help getting a few bottles of aspirin to start with.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance.  We need skilled survivors.
dialogue.advice: Aspirin is pretty common in homes and convenience stores.
dialogue.success: We'll go through this pretty quickly but it does help.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

description: Find and bring back 7 bandages and 20 charges of antiseptic from various locations.

dialogue.offer: I was given a few bottles of bleach when I arrived but I need a number of medical supplies to actually use.  I'm sure you can find them in any old house or a hospital.  I will give you the numbers of items in need.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance.  We need skilled survivors.
dialogue.advice: It should be a fairly common item, don't know what else to say.
dialogue.inquire: Do you have the medical supplies?
dialogue.success: It's awesome to meet someone who's responsible and willing to take risks for the greater good.  Thank you for your help.  Here is your reward.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

dialogue.offer: Disease is spreading rapidly due to malnutrition and there is little that I can do about it.  With food being scarce, people are willing to survive on whatever they can.  I need to start supplementing the school's diet with vitamins to prevent potential deaths indirectly attributable to nutrition.  I know it is a lot but if you could bring me 200 multivitamin pills I'd be able to treat the most vulnerable before they spread anything to the rest of us.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance.  We need skilled survivors.
dialogue.advice: It should be a fairly common item, don't know what else to say.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

name.str: Find or make a mechanical pump

dialogue.offer: Despite my recommendations, we continue to have travelers come in with illnesses I've been able to trace back to dehydration.  We do need a pump that we can use if needed.  If you could build me a mechanical pump I'll let others to make the water system.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance.  We need skilled survivors.
dialogue.advice: With some basic survival and crafting skills you should be able to make them with little effort.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

dialogue.offer: I've been working on producing some of our own medical supplies but we do not have enough.  I read in a medical book that one can heal oneself with some herbs that you can find, so could you please bring ten green herbs for me?
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance.  We need skilled survivors.
dialogue.advice: You might be able to find one in a flower pot if you can't find them in a bush.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

dialogue.offer: The number of airway infections that I've encountered in the past week has depleted my supply of masks.  Could you find me 5 filter masks?  I tend to only distribute them in severe cases so I'll be sure to make them last.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance.  We need skilled survivors.
dialogue.advice: You may be able to make one if you had the right guide.
dialogue.inquire: Do you have the filter masks?
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

dialogue.offer: The bodily fluids that I often have to clean up and the caustic chemicals I deal with have done a number on my current pair of gloves.  Could you find me two pairs of heavy rubber gloves?  That should be enough that I can task a few laborers with cleanup details in the event of an outbreak.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance.  We need skilled survivors.
dialogue.advice: You should be able to find them in cleaning closets.
dialogue.inquire: Do you have the rubber gloves?
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

dialogue.offer: Dr. Lee and I am the only ones you can call 'medical help' here.  The workers have already begun expanding the clinic but I need you to locate a pair of scalpels to use in surgery when he arrives.  I'm sure you should be able to find them in a hospital or craft shop.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance.  We need skilled survivors.
dialogue.advice: Hospitals and crafting stores should have a few.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

dialogue.offer: Have you heard of a book called the 'Guide to Advanced Emergency Care?'  I really need a copy.  We need a lot of supplies that I'm not familiar with but I believe I could make if I could get a copy of the book.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance.  We need skilled survivors.
dialogue.advice: Libraries are the only place I'd think to look.
dialogue.inquire: Do you have the Guide to Advanced Emergency Care?
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

dialogue.offer: I need two first aid kits to help a person.  It's not urgent, but I used the last one and need some more for future uses.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance.  We need skilled survivors.
dialogue.advice: Hospitals, clinics or the glass cabinets might have a few sitting around.
dialogue.inquire: Do you have the first aid kit?
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

dialogue.describe: You seem to know this new world better than most…
dialogue.offer: You're kitted out better than most… would you be interested in making this world a little better for the rest of us?  The school have enough supplies for us survivors to start securing a foothold but we don't have anyone with the skills and equipment to thin the masses of undead.  Twenty zombie sweep, what do you say?
dialogue.accepted: Thank you for taking on the quest to eliminate 20 zombies—your bravery keeps us safe!
dialogue.rejected: I understand your hesitation, but if you reconsider, your bravery could make a big difference — please think about it again.
dialogue.advice: I'd secure an ammo cache and try to sweep a town in multiple passes.  Also grab some explosives if needed.
dialogue.success: Man… you're a goddamn machine.  It was a pleasure working with you.  You know, you may just change our little neck of the world if you keep this up.
dialogue.success_lie: I don't think that was quite a twenty dead zeds.

dialogue.offer: We are starting to isolate a few natural antibiotic serums but we don't have the supplies to administer the cocktails.  I need you to bring me 3 empty syringes to use.  I'll take care of cleaning them to prevent transferring infections.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance.  We need skilled survivors.
dialogue.advice: Hospitals or clinics might have a few sitting around.
dialogue.inquire: Do you have the empty syringes?
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…
